div.td:
[1] Product screen - [ ] Set plus/minus (+/-)
- [*] Go category home (h)
- [*] Focus mouse to search box (s)
- [*] Blur (leave mouse) search box (esc)
- [*] Go Payment (space)
- [*] Set customer (c)
- [*] Change qty, disc, price : 0 to 9 and .
- [*] If search have result only one product, press (enter) for auto add to cart - [*] Go Orders Screen (o)
- [*] Change unit of measure of selected line (ctrl)
- [*] Remove selected line (del | delete)

group.td:
[2] customer screen
- [*] Back (Discard) (b)
- [*] Set Customer (enter)
- [*] Edit Customer (e)
- [*] Save button (enter)
- [*] Focus mouse to search box (s)
- [*] Quit Search (esc)

[********] Guide tip
- [*] Press (s) to product search box, if have only one product result, press Enter for add product to Cart
- [*] Press (c) for go to Customer Screen, search Customer, if result only one, Press Enter for set Client and back to Product Screen

div.td:
[3] Payment Screen
- [*] Back Screen (b)
- [*] Validate Order (enter)

[4] Receipt Screen
- [*] Print Receipt (p)
- [*] Next order (enter)
- [*] Download Invoice (d)

[5] Orders Screen
- [*] Back Screen (b)
- [*] New Order (n)
- [*] Delete Current Order (del)
- [*] Focus Mouse to searchbox (s)
- [*] Leave seachbox (esc)
- [*] Open Filter (f)

button.name: remove_sync_between_session_logs
button.confirm: We will remove all logs transactions of future Sync Between Sessions send to this POS Config. Are you really want to do it now ?

group.div: 1 POS Config - Multi Employee - Each Employee is 1 POS Session

div.div: Enable to use Gift Card in POS Interface.

group.div:
If you active it, all POS Master Datas (POS Session, POS Config, Payment methods ...) will save to Browse Cache
It can help POS Users quickly starting POS Screen only few seconds
If you need applied new changes from Backend, you can remove Browse Cache
Or on POS Screen / Numpad Buttons / click to button Update Cache

button.name: reinstall_database

group.string: Blocked Products List (not display on POS)

field.name: logo
field.string: Receipt's Logo and POS App Logo

button.name: revertToDefaultStyle
button.string: Revert to Default Stype Of App

group.div:
Before active this feature, make sure your printer ip address
And your odoo ip address the same Lan Network
Because it required for this feature can work
This feature no need IOTBOX
